version_description:
What's new
- Supports application lock with passcode and Face ID.
- Supports concurrently setting multiple files to allow offline access.

Fixed bugs
- Optimized the display of Synology Slides and Microsoft PowerPoint files.
- Fixed iss

- Fixed an issue where the setting button might not be properly displayed when users log in with usernames that are too long
- Minor bug fixes
This is the initial release of this app and requires Synology Drive package and DSM 6.1.3 or above to run.

- Fixed an issue where the setting button might not be properly displayed when users log in with usernames that are too long
- Minor bug fixes
